com.customlbs.surface.library

Class IndoorsSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.customlbs.surface.library.IndoorsSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public final class IndoorsSurface
extends android.view.View
    SurfaceView that draws the map and handles touch gestures. Painting is done by a separate thread on demand via updates. The tiles are loaded in a separate thread. Tiles are saved in a LRU cache, tune this if there are problems with memory.

      • scrollToPositionAnimated

        public void scrollToPositionAnimated(float x,
                            float y)
        Scrolls in an animation to x/y. Scrolling out of boundaries is not allowed (except for debug mode) The duration of the animation is 300ms.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position, to which is scrolled
        y - The y position, to which is scrolled

      • scrollToZone

        public void scrollToZone(Zone zone)
        Gets a zone und scrolls in an animation to the center of this zone. Disables auto select.
        Parameters:
        zone -
